libshapedraw.shape
Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  libshapedraw.shape.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
GLUShape, WireframeShape
public abstract class Shape
extends Object

Generic base class for a renderable object.

Constructor Detail

Shape

public Shape(Vector3 origin)
Method Detail

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
If false, the Shape will not be rendered.

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean visible)
If false, the Shape will not be rendered.

getOriginReadonly

public ReadonlyVector3 getOriginReadonly()
The point around which ShapeTransforms should occur. This is generally the center point of the Shape, if that makes sense for the Shape type.

getOrigin

protected Vector3 getOrigin()
See Also:
getOriginReadonly()

setOrigin

protected void setOrigin(Vector3 origin)
See Also:
getOriginReadonly()

isRelativeToOrigin

public boolean isRelativeToOrigin()
If true, render this shape relative to its own origin x/y/z. If false, rendering will ignore the shape's origin, operating on absolute world x/y/z coordinates.

Which setting is the default, and whether it's possible to change this setting, depends on the Shape type.

setRelativeToOrigin

protected void setRelativeToOrigin(boolean relativeToOrigin)
See Also:
isRelativeToOrigin()

getTransforms

public List<ShapeTransform> getTransforms()
Get a read-only view of the list of ShapeTransforms to perform right before rendering this Shape, if any. To modify this list use addTransform, removeTransform, and clearTransforms.

addTransform

public Shape addTransform(ShapeTransform transform)
Register a ShapeTransform to be applied to this Shape.

Thread safety is not guaranteed. To avoid non-deterministic behavior, only call this method from the main Minecraft thread.

Returns:
the instance (for method chaining)

removeTransform

public Shape removeTransform(ShapeTransform transform)
Unregister a ShapeTransform, no longer applying it to this Shape.

Attempting to remove a transform that is not registered to this shape is allowed but won't do anything.

Thread safety is not guaranteed. To avoid non-deterministic behavior, only call this method from the main Minecraft thread.

Returns:
the instance (for method chaining)

clearTransforms

public Shape clearTransforms()
Unregister all ShapeTransforms registered to this Shape.

Thread safety is not guaranteed. To avoid non-deterministic behavior, only call this method from the main Minecraft thread.

Returns:
the instance (for method chaining)

onAdd

public void onAdd(LibShapeDraw apiInstance)
Called whenever this Shape is added to a LibShapeDraw API instance's set of shapes to render.

onRemove

public void onRemove(LibShapeDraw apiInstance)
Called whenever this Shape is removed from a LibShapeDraw API instance's set of shapes to render.

This method should clean up any external resources (such as VBOs) that were owned by this Shape.

onPreRender

public void onPreRender(MinecraftAccess mc)
Called immediately before this Shape is rendered.

Calls glContextStandardSetup.

glContextStandardSetup

public static final void glContextStandardSetup()
Resets common OpenGL context settings, helping ensure that Shapes will render the same regardless of what was rendered beforehand.

onPostRender

public void onPostRender(MinecraftAccess mc)
Called immediately after this Shape is rendered.

If any unique OpenGL context settings were applied but not reset during rendering, they should be reset here. Otherwise, later elements may be rendered incorrectly.

render

public final void render(MinecraftAccess mc)
Render the Shape, if visible. Also perform any ShapeTransforms registered to this Shape.

This method is automatically called as appropriate when a Shape has been registered to a LibShapeDraw API instance using addShape.

It can also be called manually for Shapes not associated with an API instance.

renderShape

protected abstract void renderShape(MinecraftAccess mc)
Does the actual work of rendering the Shape, called by the Shape's main render method after setting up the OpenGL context.

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object
